mapper.select: select a.dept, a.username, a.email, b.login_ip, a.account_id, date_format(b.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as login_time from account a inner join account_log b on a.account_id = b.account_id where b.login_time between str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s');

select a.name, date_format(b.menu_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as menu_time from resources a inner join account_menu_log b on a.resources_id = b.menu_id where b.account_id = #{account_id} and b.menu_time between str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s');
